decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with spells and summoning Arclight Phoenix multiple times in a turn to deal fast, consistent damage to the opponent. The deck includes card draw spells like Opt and Consider to cycle through the deck, as well as removal spells like Fiery Impulse and Lightning Axe to control the board. Artist's Talent and Picklock Prankster provide additional value and versatility in the deck, while Treasure Cruise and Profit's Eidetic Memory keep the hand full of options. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells and aggressive creatures.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board and resources while setting up card advantage and locking down the game. It utilizes cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria to disrupt the opponent's strategy, along with counter spells like Dovin's Veto. The deck also includes cards like Supreme Verdict for board wipes and Omen of the Sea for card selection. The companion Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value by flickering permanents for extra advantage. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through a combination of disruption and card advantage.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive plays, aiming to deal damage quickly to the opponent. It includes powerful creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Kumano Faces Kakkazan, along with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike to clear the way. It also includes cards like Reckless Rage to control the board and push damage through. The key strategy is to maintain pressure and finish off the opponent as efficiently as possible, using a mix of creatures and burn spells to secure victory.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with efficient creatures like Bishop of Wings, Skyclave Apparition, and Resplendent Angel. Utilizing ramp creatures like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves allows for early Collected Company plays to further develop the board. Righteous Valkyrie provides a powerful anthem effect, boosting the team's power and toughness. Kayla's Reconstruction can be used to bring back key creatures from the graveyard. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of threats and efficient beatdown tactics.

Focus on disrupting the opponent's hand and board with discard spells like Thoughtseize and Duress, while controlling the game with cards like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat. Utilize powerful creatures like Graveyard Trespasser and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to apply pressure and outvalue the opponent. Use Mutavault to be able to attack while still holding up mana for removal. Castle Locthwain provides card advantage, while Unholy Annex / Ritual Chamber can help stabilize your life total. Overall, the deck aims to grind out the opponent and win through attrition.

The main idea of this Aggro Red Deck Wins pioneer deck is to quickly and aggressively attack the opponent using creatures like Manifold Mouse, Heartfire Hero, and Emberheart Challenger. The deck also includes direct damage spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike to finish off opponents or remove threats. The deck's key strategy is to control the battlefield and deal consistent damage to the opponent while applying pressure. The land base includes utility lands like Den of the Bugbear and Ramunap Ruins to provide additional benefits.

The primary focus of the deck is to leverage low-cost creatures and mana ramp to quickly build a strong board presence, while also utilizing cards like Collected Company to get additional creatures onto the battlefield. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures such as Resplendent Angel and Skyclave Apparition, using cards like Righteous Valkyrie and Bishop of Wings to gain life and maintain board control. The mana base is carefully selected to ensure consistent access to white and green mana sources for casting spells and activating abilities efficiently.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures from the Selesnya color combination. By playing cards like Bishop of Wings, Resplendent Angel, and Righteous Valkyrie, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and put pressure on the opponent. Collected Company is used to dig for more creatures and generate advantage. The deck also includes mana ramp with cards like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic to accelerate its game plan. Overall, the deck focuses on aggression, efficient creatures, and synergy within the Selesnya color combination.

The deck focuses on assembling Lotus Field and using various cards to generate mana quickly and efficiently in order to cast powerful spells such as Emergent Ultimatum and Omniscience. The deck also includes control elements like Strict Proctor and Dark Petition to disrupt the opponent's game plan. By leveraging the unique abilities of Lotus Field and other key cards, the deck aims to create explosive turns that can quickly overwhelm the opponent and win the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice synergies to generate value and disrupt opponents, while also utilizing card draw and ramp to maintain pressure and resource advantage. It aims to quickly establish a board presence and control the game through targeted removal and efficient creature interactions. The key strategy is to overwhelm opponents with a combination of efficient threats and disruptive spells, while leveraging the graveyard and sacrificing creatures for additional value.

This Aggro deck focuses on quickly getting Arclight Phoenix into the graveyard and then bringing them back to the battlefield to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck includes cards that support this strategy such as Lightning Axe, Treasure Cruise, and Fiery Impulse. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Picklock Prankster and Temporal Trespass to help maintain board presence and provide additional damage. The inclusion of spells like Opt, Consider, and Sleight of Hand ensure that the player can quickly find the cards they need to execute their game plan effectively.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly pump out aggressive artifact creatures, such as Cori-Steel Cutter, and attach them with Ensoul Artifact to create powerful threats. Utilizing cards like Spyglass Siren and Torch the Tower to control the board and deal damage, while also including cards like Tormod's Crypt to disrupt opponent strategies. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast tempo and efficient removal spells, making it difficult for them to establish their own game plan.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combination of Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II to create a strong board presence. It includes cards like Fatal Push and Guardian of New Benalia to control the board and protect the combo pieces. The deck also includes Monument to Endurance and Ovalchase Daredevil for recursion and card advantage. The lands are carefully chosen to support the combo strategy, with options for mana fixing and protection. Overall, the deck aims to quickly establish a dominating board presence and overwhelm the opponent with its combo synergy.

This Jund aggro deck focuses on sacrificing creatures to trigger powerful effects like Mayhem Devil and Bloodtithe Harvester, while utilizing cards like Witch's Oven and Deadly Dispute to generate value from sacrificing creatures. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Torch the Tower, while also applying pressure with efficient creatures like Cauldron Familiar. The deck's synergy and efficient threats make it a strong choice for aggressive gameplay in the Pioneer 1 vs 1 format.

This Aggro Red Deck Wins archetype focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to deal damage to the opponent's life total as quickly as possible using efficient creatures like Manifold Mouse and Emberheart Challenger, supported by powerful burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike. The deck also includes cards like Reckless Rage and Monstrous Rage to clear the opponent's blockers and push through damage. Overall, the goal is to maintain early pressure and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with instants and sorceries to enable the recurring ability of Arclight Phoenix. By using cheap cantrips like Opt and Consider, along with removal spells like Fiery Impulse and Lightning Axe, the deck is able to cast multiple spells in a turn to bring back Arclight Phoenix and apply pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Artist's Talent and Picklock Prankster also allow for additional card draw and disruption to further support the aggressive game plan.
